provider.description: The provider of the sandbox, e.g. 'daytona', 'vercel', 'cloudflare', etc.

website.description: Any URI related to the sandbox

logo.description: URI to an image logo for the sandbox

repo.description: A git repository URL to clone into the sandbox, e.g. a GitHub/Tangled repo.

readme.description: A URI to a README for the sandbox.

vcpus.description: Number of virtual CPUs allocated to the sandbox

memory.description: Amount of memory in GB allocated to the sandbox

disk.description: Amount of disk space in GB allocated to the sandbox

installs.description: Number of times the sandbox has been installed by users.

name.description: Name of the secret, e.g. 'DATABASE_URL', 'SSH_KEY', etc.

value.description: Value of the secret. This will be encrypted at rest and redacted in any API responses.

name.description: Name of the environment variable, e.g. 'NODE_ENV', 'PORT', etc.

value.description: Value of the environment variable. This will be visible in API responses and should not contain sensitive information.

items.description: A secret to add to the sandbox
An environment variable to add to the sandbox
